TopicTitle: Around the Word (Twice) and Back Home!

Articles.Content: Well... I\'m quite proud of myself! I launched a heavy-payload rocket into orbit and released a satellite... nothing special... but then I decided to go back home. Not home as in Kerbin, I mean the space center! I have never been able to land back at the center, so I was just trying to get as close as I could with a re-purposed lander and a mech-jeb autopilot. Amazingly, I landed right on the road from the VAB to the launch tower!!! I still had some fuel left, so I did what any good Kerbal would do: smashed it into the top of the VAB!

That\'s cool. The closest I came was after a munar mission. I landed in the ocean to the east, but I did see the blinking lights of the space center at night as I passed over.

Shame about the boys, though.
